quote: There's no such things as survival of the fittest. Survival of the most adequate, maybe. It doesn't matter whether a solution's optimal. All that matters is whether it beats the alternative.
quote_letters: THERES NO SUCH THINGS AS SURVIVAL OF THE FITTEST SURVIVAL OF THE MOST ADEQUATE MAYBE IT DOESNT MATTER WHETHER A SOLUTIONS OPTIMAL ALL THAT MATTERS IS WHETHER IT BEATS THE ALTERNATIVE
